definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">BlockPos pos = new BlockPos(x, y, z);</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">BlockState state = world.getBlockState(pos);</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">DirectionProperty property = (DirectionProperty) state.getBlock().getStateContainer().getProperty("facing");</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">Direction direction = state.get(property);</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">BlockPos blockpos = pos.offset(direction.getOpposite());</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">BlockState blockstate = world.getBlockState(blockpos);</field><next><block type="block_inv_damage_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="return_logic"><value name="return"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">blockstate.isSolidSide(world, blockpos, direction)</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
